about_the_game:
Dodge It! 3 Worlds Unveiled Map Pack takes the excitement to a whole new level with four immersive and diverse maps, each bringing its own unique challenges and environments.

In Sahara, brace yourself for intense action in the heart of a vast, scorching desert. Navigate through shifting sands and towering dunes while dodging obstacles in this relentless sun-drenched battlefield.

The haunting Cemetery invites you to face your fears as you dodge around tombstones, crypts, and ghostly fog. Every corner hides potential hazards in this dark and foreboding landscape, where the line between the living and the dead seems to blur.

Next, enter the whimsical and deliciously dangerous Candyland, a sugar-coated world filled with vibrant colors and tricky terrain. With oversized candies, frosting hills, and a landscape as sweet as it is perilous, you’ll need quick reflexes to escape sticky situations.

Finally, Mushroomland offers a magical and surreal adventure, where giant mushrooms and fungal growths create a strange yet enchanting world. The unusual flora provides both beauty and unexpected challenges as you navigate this fantastical landscape.

Each map brings a fresh experience, adding variety and depth to the high-octane gameplay of Dodge It! 3. Whether you’re exploring the heat of the desert or the whimsical land of sweets, the Worlds Unveiled Map Pack will keep you on your toes, offering endless thrills and new ways to test your dodging skills!"
detailed_description:
Dodge It! 3 Worlds Unveiled Map Pack takes the excitement to a whole new level with four immersive and diverse maps, each bringing its own unique challenges and environments.

In Sahara, brace yourself for intense action in the heart of a vast, scorching desert. Navigate through shifting sands and towering dunes while dodging obstacles in this relentless sun-drenched battlefield.

The haunting Cemetery invites you to face your fears as you dodge around tombstones, crypts, and ghostly fog. Every corner hides potential hazards in this dark and foreboding landscape, where the line between the living and the dead seems to blur.

Next, enter the whimsical and deliciously dangerous Candyland, a sugar-coated world filled with vibrant colors and tricky terrain. With oversized candies, frosting hills, and a landscape as sweet as it is perilous, you’ll need quick reflexes to escape sticky situations.

Finally, Mushroomland offers a magical and surreal adventure, where giant mushrooms and fungal growths create a strange yet enchanting world. The unusual flora provides both beauty and unexpected challenges as you navigate this fantastical landscape.

Each map brings a fresh experience, adding variety and depth to the high-octane gameplay of Dodge It! 3. Whether you’re exploring the heat of the desert or the whimsical land of sweets, the Worlds Unveiled Map Pack will keep you on your toes, offering endless thrills and new ways to test your dodging skills!"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gt
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Dodge It! 3 Worlds Unveiled Map Pack introduces four exciting new maps: Sahara, Cemetery, Candyland, and Mushroomland. Each map offers unique environments, from scorching desert of the Sahara to the Cemetery, the sweet chaos of Candyland, and the whimsical Mushroomland. Get ready for new challenges!
